alert.note: Alert for Central Greenville; Laurens; Northern Spartanburg; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg; Union (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 2:59PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Laurens, east central Greenville, central Spartanburg and northwestern Union Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 259 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southwest of Spartanburg, or near Reidville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenville Downtown, Spartanburg, Greenville Eastside, Mauldin, Simpsonville, Five Forks, Fountain Inn, Woodruff, Duncan and Roebuck. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Greenville; Laurens; Northern Spartanburg; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg; Union
